title: Hart County accidental shooting
content:
CUB RUN, Ky. (WBKO) - A Hart County teen was taken to University of Louisville Hospital after being accidentally shot over the weekend.
Kentucky State Police says the preliminary investigation shows the
15-year-old accidentally shot by another teenager in the Cub Run area.
At last word he was in critical but stable condition.
Police are not releasing the names of those involved since they are juveniles.
